name: Unknown Force (SimTech)
description:
Youre sendt in to disarm bombs that a unknown organization have placed out. You cant exit the building before you  have disarmed all bombs. Theres also been reports of paranormal activities and you must stop the organization, so the investigations can continue. 

How to play:

Talk to the detective and accept missions.  

Interact: E

Open mission log: Tab

Turn on flashlight: F

Trigger slow-motion: C

Epilepsy warning: This game contains flickering lights,  play with cautions.
Known bugs: Loading button wont work on the main menu - Footstep sounds plays too fast when crouching - Blood particles burts of AIs feets (Will be fixed in a update)

Credits

Developer: Åsmund Schei

Music: CO.AG

Voice-over: Lara Sluyter

Models: (Various Unreal marketplace packs)
